summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey E. Epstein. The invoice includes transportation charges, discounts, and specific shipment details for multiple packages sent by Epstein, along with payment instructions and due dates.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-755-99061, dated June 13, 2005.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $148.42.
The invoice includes details of multiple shipments sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Shipments were sent to recipients including Jenne Brennan and Miles Alexander.
The payment for the invoice is due by June 28, 2005.
